transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hello.
Customer: Haan kaun?
Executive: RT International se bol rahi hu Nutan Mishra.
Customer: Ji ji boliye.
Customer: Mujhe puchna hai madam IndiaMART pe bol jab hum inquiry karte hai ya register karte hai to bolte hai ki jitne bhi aapko query aayega wo verified customer se aayega.
Executive: Jo bhi hume lead aati hai ya fir aapne kis number se call kiya hai?
Customer: Avni ji bol rahi hai na?
Executive: Ji mai Avni bol rahi hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan haan bataiye.
Customer: To to mera mera ye query hai madam ki aap log bolte ho ki verified lead hi aayegi verified customer ke hi inquiry aayenge aapko.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Aur hume pichle 6 mahine me teesri baar fraud call aa chuke hai ek baar to humare humne maal bhej diya tha wo fraud nikla wo jo aajkal wo cyber crime karte hai unke through aa rahe calls madam kyun?
Executive: Matlab kaise?
Customer: Jaise hume lead aa rahe hai maal bhej diya tha to payment nahi mila aisa?
Executive: Payment wali baat hi nahi wo wo Delhi baith ke phone kar rahe the aur hume yaha mere jo bandi ne lead liya tha usko yaha local me kisi government officer Direct call tha kya?
Customer: Yes IndiaMART buyer karke aaya tha.
Executive: To direct call jo IndiaMART registered number hai.
Customer: Direct call yaani IndiaMART pe lead aata hai usko buy karne ke baad ki baat hai madam.
Executive: Abhi bhi dekho na latest me abhi jo mera last agar aap mera account check kar rahe ho last me jo Baddi se aaya wo same problem wali hai fraud hai wo.
Executive: Just a minute Baddi se last jo lead liya hai.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai?
Customer: Wo same hi hai hume experience ho gaya na teesri baar ho raha hai aap unko verified bologe kya wo wo matlab unka check karo to aap.
Executive: Ji ji hai aap ek baar mujhe ek second abhi aap last to abhi haan haan Baddi ka hai Baddi ka.
Customer: Iske pehle to madam dedh lakh ka loss hote hote bacha wo to baad me humne turant apne New Delhi ki lead thi Gopal Rex Ribbons isse pehle 23 ko ek Morbi ki lead hai Baddi ki kaun si hai?
Executive: Ya aapne Baddi ki to koi lead consume nahi ki. ji haan Baddi liya hai na madam aapka lead manager me dekho na last sabse last me G I Y A.
Customer: Kis jagah ki hai ye?
Customer: Baddi madam Baddi long line karke hai naam aur G I Y A Inquiry aayi hai kya direct aapko lead to nahi consume ki aapne iski koi Baddi ki.
Customer: Ye aapko lead manager me dikh raha hai kya aapko? nahi hume lead manager ka data nahi dikhta hai aap ya to mujhe video meet pe ek baar screen share karke dikha do.
Executive: Ek second mai screen shot bhejti hu uska. Maine isliye call kiya na kyuki teesri baar ho raha tha hume difficult ho raha hai.
Executive: Ek second mai aap mail id boliye mai aapko link bhejti hu.
Customer: Meri email id rtraintrade@gmail.com
Executive: RTR international
Customer: INT
Executive: Trade t r a d e @gmail.com
Executive: @gmail.com

Executive: Mai schedule kar rahi hu.
Executive: Aap ek baar apna laptop hai kya?
Customer: Nahi mere paas laptop filhal nahi hai mai ghar pe aayi thi lunch ke liye to mujhe phone aaya to maine immediately aapko phone kiya.
Executive: Aapke paas call kaise aaya matlab by lead or inquiry pe to aap call karte ho na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapke paas call aaya it means ya to wo direct call hoga.
Customer: Ye le jo mera app hai na IndiaMART ka usme to lead manager me do do jo last ke hai jiya aur ye ek long line karke wo dono hi hai dono hume show ho raha hai aapko pata nahi kyun nahi dikh raha wo.
Customer: Aur iske pehle jo hua tha wo hum jo bal bal bache the usme jaise hi humne wapas material liya na wo IndiaMART se uska delete bhi ho gaya record to ye ho raha hai madam problem aap thoda mail aaya aapke paas mail aaya?
Executive: Kaunsa mail?
Executive: Maine ek video meet ka mail bheja hai. Mai office jaake hi check kar sakti hu sir to.
Executive: Aap office kab tak jaoge aap? 3 baje ke aas paas mai to abhi just aayi thi ghar pe lunch ke liye.
Executive: Accha accha to fir mai lunch ke baad fir 3 baje karti hu fir schedule kyuki maine kar di thi fir mujhe isko cancel karna padega.
Customer: Thik hai chalo okay aap to aap mujhe wo bhej do aapke paas mera number hai contact number?
Customer: Yahi jo aa raha hai wahi na last me 2721 hai.
Executive: Ji nahi mera number aapne 96 pe call kiya hai to iski wajah se aapka concern bhi raise ho gaya hai aapne mere direct number pe call nahi kiya hai thik hai. Mera number hai 772096082.
Customer: Ek second fir se boliye.
Executive: 77
Customer: 77
Executive: 20
Customer: 20
Executive: 960
Customer: 960
Executive: 82
Customer: 82
Executive: Same is just 6 mai add kar leti hu.
Customer: Okay chalo madam mai phone karti hu fir office pahunch ke 3 baje ke baad.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received fraud calls multiple times.

- Customer questions the verification process of leads.

- Wants to know why fraud leads are generated.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for the customer's email ID.

- Executive shared her direct contact number.

- Executive scheduled a video meet for 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the mail at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud calls, lead verification, video meet, buyleads
